column5: If this thing lasts until August, I'm going to need a volunteer to meet me halfway across Lake Erie and smuggle me into Canada. Â Also going to need a ride to Sturgeon Falls. Â  Keep it between us. Â Please.
Ya don't wanna go to Sturgeon, A hairy bigfoot lives there...ðŸ˜†
You will be paying in US funds, cash no cheques ?
Don't have a boat but if you can make it to dry land I volunteer to drive you up to Sturgeon Falls ðŸ˜Š
Cold hard cash, Misfish. Â Thanks Cliff, part two is taken care of!
I'd do it but then I'd have to self isolate for 2 weeks.
Tell you what Marty. I'll go fishin' for ya and send you LOTS of photos.

We live on the Canuck shore of Lake Erie. I can meet you 1/2 way. I'll bring the dingy and troll you 6 feet behind my boat. Once you get here you are on your own. For me to become a Coyote it will cost you 25 grand USD.
Marty, you know us Canucks are always willing to help in any way we can. Especially when it will put cash in our Jeans.
